results.title: Datadog overview - Azure Native Integrations
results.description: What is Datadog. You can find Datadog in the Azure portal or get it on Azure Marketplace. Datadog is a monitoring and analytics platform for large-scale applications. It encompasses infrastructure monitoring, application performance monitoring, log management, and user-experience monitoring. Datadog aggregates data across your entire stack with.

descriptions.content: What is Datadog. You can find Datadog in the Azure portal or get it on Azure Marketplace. Datadog is a monitoring and analytics platform for large-scale applications. It encompasses infrastructure monitoring, application performance monitoring, log management, and user-experience monitoring. Datadog aggregates data across your entire stack with.

results.title: Configure Datadog for Single sign-on with Microsoft Entra ID - Microsoft Entra ID
results.description: Configure Datadog for Single sign-on with Microsoft Entra ID In this article,  you learn how to integrate Datadog with Microsoft Entra ID. When you integrate Datadog with Microsoft Entra ID, you can: Control in Microsoft Entra ID who has access to Datadog. Enable your users to be automatically signed-in to D... Datadog single sign-on (SSO) enabled.

results.title: Manage settings for your Datadog resource via Azure portal - Azure Native Integrations
results.description: Manage Datadog resources This article shows how to manage the settings for Datadog. Resource overview Begin by signing in to the Azure portal. In the Azure portal search bar, enter All resources and select All resources from the results. From the Resources list, select your resource. The Azure portal shows the resource with the Overview page open,.
